Question: With this person's agreement to host the tournament, its name was changed to the ____ Shriners Hospitals for Children Open.
Hints: This person is the executive producer on the MTV reality series The Phone, which premiered on April 21, 2009.
This person's parents divorced when he was three; his mother remarried when he was five.
In October 2011, this person received the Futures Award at the Environmental Media Awards for his green-conscious golf course.
